content.22: Then the disciples looked one on another, doubting of whom he spake.
content.23: Now there was leaning on Jesus’ bosom one of his disciples, whom Jesus loved.
content.24: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him, that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake.
content.25: He then lying on Jesus’ breast saith unto him, Lord, who is it?

content.28: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him.
content.30: He then having received the sop went immediately out: and it was night.
content.31: Therefore, when he was gone out, Jesus said,
content.32: If God be glorified in him, God shall also glorify him in himself, and shall straightway glorify him.
content.33: Little children, yet a little while I am with you. Ye shall seek me: and as I said unto the Jews, Whither I go, ye cannot come; so now I say to you.
content.34: A new commandment I give unto you, That ye love one another; as I have loved you, that ye also love one another.
content.36: Simon Peter said unto him, Lord, whither goest thou? Jesus answered him,
content.37: Peter said unto him, Lord, why cannot I follow thee now? I will lay down my life for thy sake.
